definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: For referral or check details, pls. contact Shirley Naturopathic Holistic Centre.
sentences.chinese: 如需转介或查询详情，请联络莎莉自然疗法医疗中心。

sentences.english: For referral or details, pls. contact Shirley Naturopathic Holistic Centre.
sentences.chinese: 如需转介或查询详情，请联络莎莉自然疗法医疗中心。

sentences.english: They are like a natural therapy or massage session, but they cost a lot less!
sentences.chinese: 眼泪就像一种自然疗法或按摩疗程，但花费能少很多。

sentences.english: The natural healing arts have been with us for ages, and can often be very powerful - by engaging and supporting our body's Innate Wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 自然疗法已经伴随人类多年，并且经常能够妙手回春。

sentences.english: It is a green naturopathy without insult and drugs.
sentences.chinese: 它是一种无创伤非药物性绿色的自然疗法。

sentences.english: Forgiveness stands first of all other natural remedies.
sentences.chinese: 在所有自然疗法中，原谅首当其冲。

sentences.english: Natural Cures are being sought for more and more.
sentences.chinese: 自然疗法正在寻求更多的合作。

sentences.english: Discussions about “natural cures” are constantly springing up.
sentences.chinese: 有关“自然疗法”的讨论不断涌现。

sentences.english: There are many different kinds of natural remedies to help overcome iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 有很多种不同的自然疗法来帮助克服缺铁。

sentences.english: He is a practicing Doctor of Naturopathy specialized in Wheatgrass Therapy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个实践的自然疗法医生的专业草治疗。

sentences.english: Meridian natural moxibustion: Diagnosing before moxibustion is only for reference.
sentences.chinese: 循经感传自然疗法在施灸前的诊断只是作为参作用。

definition: Ayurveda (ancient Indian system and health care philosophy)
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
to combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine
Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
